RoyaltySetForCollection(address,uint96).details: emitted when royalties set for token.

changeCollectionManager(address).details: Can be called only by the current manager.

getRoyaltyInfo(address).details: royalty info for specific token / collection.It will return custom rate for the token, otherwise will return the default one.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setRoyaltyRateForCollection(address,uint.details: set royalty rate for specific collection. Support multiple set. The length of array between tokens & rates must exactly the same.

setRoyaltyRateForCollections(address[],u.details: set royalty rate for specific collection. Support multiple set. The length of array between tokens & rates must exactly the same.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

changeDefaultRoyaltyRatePercentage(uint9.notice: the deafult royalty rate can be 0.

collectionManager().notice: the authorized address who can change some configuration of collections.

setRoyaltyRateForCollection(address,uint.notice: the rate will be applied to all of token ids inside the collection.Owner or factory can perform this function call.

setRoyaltyRateForCollections(address[],u.notice: the rate will be applied to all of token ids inside the collection.only owner can call the multiple set.
